name.th: ตะโกนได้เต็ม 15

description.en: Expands your shout range to the entire channel. Lasts for 15 days after activation. (Required level: 20)
description.ar: Expands your shout range to the entire channel. Lasts for 15 days after activation. (Required level: 20)
description.br: Expande o alcance do seu Grito para todo o canal por 15 dias. (Nível requerido: 20)
description.de: Erhöht die Reichweite von /Shout. Erst ab Level 20 verwendbar. Bitte die Regeln zu Shoutspam beachten. (15 Tage)
description.fi: Expands your shout range to the entire channel. Lasts for 15 days after activation. (Required level: 20)
description.fil: Expands your shout range to the entire channel. Lasts for 15 days after activation. (Required level: 20)
description.fr: Parchemin rendant vos cris audibles dans tout Madrigal pendant 15 jours (sur le canal où se trouve votre personnage).
description.id: Memperluas jangkauan teriakanmu ke seluruh saluran. Berlangsung selama 15 hari setelah aktivasi. (Level yang dibutuhkan: 20)
description.it: Expands your shout range to the entire channel. Lasts for 15 days after activation. (Required level: 20)
description.jp: 15日間、チャットの「叫び」の聞こえる範囲が広がる。
description.nl: Expands your shout range to the entire channel. Lasts for 15 days after activation. (Required level: 20)
description.pl: Rozszerza twój krzyk na cały kanał. Trwa przez 15 dni od aktywacji. (Wymaga 20 poziomu)
description.ru: Ваш крик будет слышен всем игрокам на одном канале с вами. Рупор действует в течение 15 дней с момента применения. Требуется 20-й уровень.
description.sp: Expande tu rango de gritos a todo el canal. Tiene una duración de 15 días después de la activación. (Nivel requerido: 20)
description.sw: Expands your shout range to the entire channel. Lasts for 15 days after activation. (Required level: 20)
description.th: 15 Days Full Shout(เลเวลที่ต้องการ: 20)
description.tw: 將大喊的範圍擴大到整個瑪德利賈，使用之後將持續15天(需要等級：20)
description.vi: Mở rộng phạm vi kêu gọi của bạn cho toàn bộ kênh. Kéo dài trong 15 ngày sau khi kích hoạt. (Level yêu cầu: 20)
